S04bsu002_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam - ekasmin samaye bhagavān potalake parvate viharati sma /
S04bsu002_u:6: anekaiśca śuddhāvāsikairdevaputra koṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikān devaputrān adhikṛtya dharma deśayati sma /
S04bsu002_u:7_0: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃ samuttarāsaṃgaṃ
S04bsu002_u:7_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu002_u:8: asti mama bhagavan amoghapāśarājannāma hṛdayaṃ yanmayā pūrvvamekanavatime kalpe vilokitāyāṃ lokadhātau lokendrarājo nāma tathāgatasya sakāśādudgṛhītam /
S04bsu002_u:9_0: yena bhagavannīśvara devamaheśvara devaputrapramukhāni vahūni śuddhāvāsikāyika devaputrapramukhānyanekadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu002_u:9_1: samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau asaṃmohajñānavyūhapramukhāni ca mayā daśasamādhiśatasahasrāṇi pratilabdhāni /
S04bsu002_u:10: yasmiṃśca puna rbhagavan pṛthivī pradeśe idamamoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracaret /
S04bsu002_u:11: veditavyaṃ bhagavan stasmin pṛthivīpradeśe īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikapramukhāni dvādaśadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye sthāsyanti /
S04bsu002_u:14: aneka buddhakoṭi niyutaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu002_u:18: avīciparāyaṇaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattva ārya śrāvakapratyeka buddha pratikṣepakaḥ /
S04bsu002_u:21: yasyaiva tāvadbhagavan ekopavāho jāpena ihaiva janmani tatkarma viśudhyati /
S04bsu002_u:23: ekāhikena jvareṇa dvāhikena trāhikena vā cāturthikena vā evaṃ saptāhi kena vā jvareṇa /
S04bsu002_u:24: akṣiśūlena vā karṇa śūlena vā nāsāśūlena vā /
S04bsu002_u:26_0: tāluśūlena va hṛdayaśūlena va udaraśūlena vā pārśvaśūlena vā kaṭiśūlena vā aṅgapratyaṅgaśūlena
S04bsu002_u:26_1: vā arśagrahaṇīśūlena vā atisāreṇa vā hastapādaveda nayā vā śirorujā va valāhakaścitra
S04bsu002_u:27: saṃkṣepato bhagavan kāyapīḍayāvā cittapīḍayā vā dusvapnadarśanaṃ vā tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu002_u:29: prāgeva śuddhasattvānāṃ śraddhādhimuktikānāṃ yadi bhagavan catasraḥ pariṣadaścatvāro varṇā yāmā yā sāthenāpiya idamadiyama amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu002_u:30_0: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S04bsu002_u:30_1: anyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvayiṣyanti antastiryagyonigatānāṃ vā sattvānāṃ karṇāpūṭasthitvā
S04bsu002_u:35: teṣāṃ daśabhyo digbhyo buddhasahasraṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu002_u:42: jñātavyamiti bhagavan paṇḍite nāryāvalokiteśvarasyānubhāvena teṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdo niścarati /
S04bsu002_u:43: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścidevapurūṣaścandanaṃ vā kapūraṃ vā kasturikaṃ vā ākṛṣya paribhāṣya śilāyāṃ vā piṣṭvā ātmānaṃ lepayet /
S04bsu002_u:44: na tasya candanasya kapurakasya kasturikāyā vā /
S04bsu002_u:45: evaṃ bhavatyanāmākṛṣṭaḥ paribhāṣito vā gandhenāti kramiṣyāmiti /
S04bsu002_u:46: api ca gandha eva sa eva meva bhagavanidaṃ madoyamamoghapāśannāma hṛdayaṃ yaḥ kaścidudgrāsdya ullāpya /
S04bsu002_u:49: teṣāṃ bhagavana khakānāṃ sattvānāṃ sa eva kuśalamūla heturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu002_u:50: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra virahitāśca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu002_u:52: yaḥ kaścit bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāśako vā upāśikā vā /
S04bsu002_u:55: tasya bhagavan dṛṣṭa eva dharmma viśatiranuśaṃsaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ /
S04bsu002_u:57: utpanāścāsya rogāḥ karmmavaśena śīghraṃ prasamaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu002_u:67: saptavārāna amoghapāśahṛdayena bhasmodakaṃ vā parijapya digavidigūrddhaṃ ca kṣetrasya vandho dātavya /
S04bsu002_u:73: utpannacāsya śatru bhayaṃ śīghraṃ praśamaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu002_u:75: na kākhorddhabhayaṃ na cāsya ḍākinībhayaṃ na cāsya tīvrāḥ kleśopakleśā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu002_u:78: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatrāvirahitaśca bhaviṣyati maitrīkarūṇāmuditopekṣāyāḥ /
S04bsu002_u:81: katamānaṣṭau? maraṇakālasamaye āryāvalokiteśvaro bhikṣurūpeṇa sammukhadarśanaṃ dāsyanti //
S04bsu002_u:100: dine dine triṣkālaṃ triṇi vārān pariāvarttayitavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:102: ayaṃ cāmoghapāśahṛdayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ ca valāvalaṃ jñātvā śrāvayitavyam /
S04bsu002_u:105: satvānāmārthakaraṇena buddhabodhiḥ prāpyate bodhirityucyate prajñāsattva ityupāyaḥ //
S04bsu002_u:108: idaṃ hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ kīrtta yeyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām arthāyabodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocata /
S04bsu002_u:110: anumoditaṃ tathāgatena paścime kāle paścime samaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pitṛkāryakariṣyanti /
S04bsu002_u:111: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nibhiṣanayano bhūtvā bhagavanta metadabocata /
S04bsu002_u:112: śṛṇu me bhagavan sarvabodhisattva namaskṛtamidaṃ vimokṣamukhamaṇḍalaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya //
S04bsu002_u:113: nāmastryadhvānugatapratiṣṭhitebhya sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyo namaḥ pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvaka saṃghebhyo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannebhyo namaḥ samyaggatānāṃ /
S04bsu002_u:120: namaḥ śikhine tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya /
S04bsu002_u:127: om same same mahāsame rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvānāṃca sarvapāpaprasamane svāhā //
S04bsu002_u:134: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
S04bsu002_u:135: namo atītānāgata pratyutpannebhyo buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ // tadyathā //
S04bsu002_u:136_0: smṛtivarddhani gativarddhani dhṛtivarddhani prajñāvarddhani pratibhānavarddhani dhyānavarddhani
S04bsu002_u:138: namo ratnatrayāya namo āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākārūṇikāya /
S04bsu002_u:139_1: saṃmukhabhāṣitaṃ mahatā parṣata madhye ahamidāniṃmāvarttayiṣye sidhyantu me mantrapadā sarvvakāryāṇi /
S04bsu002_u:140: sarvabhayebhyo mama sarvasattvānāṃca rakṣā bhavatu // tadyathā //

S04bsu002_u:142: sara 2 siri 2 surū 2 curū 2 ciri 2 viri 2 piri 2 miri 2 mahāpadāhasta /

S04bsu002_u:153: surū 2 curū 2 murū 2 dhurū 2 sanatkumārarudravāsavaviṣṇudhanadavāyuagni ṛṣi nāyakavināyaka /
S04bsu002_u:155: dhara 2 dhiri 2 dhurū 2 tara 2 thara 2 dhara 2 para 2 lara 2 hara 2 yara 2 sara 2 vara 2 varadāyaka samantāvalokita lokeśvara tribhuvaneśvarasarvvaguṇa samalaṅkṛta avalokiteśvara /
S04bsu002_u:156: muhu 2 murū 2 muya 2 muṃca 2 rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasatvānāṃca sarvabhayaibhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvopasagebhyaḥ sarvagrahebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhya /
S04bsu002_u:158: evaṃ vandha vandhana tāḍana tarjjana rāja taskarāgnyūdaka viṣaśastraparimocaka // kaṇa 2
S04bsu002_u:159: kiṇi 2 kuṇu 2 cara 2 ciri 2 curū 2 indriyabalabodhyaṅgacaturāryasaṃprakāśaka //
S04bsu002_u:160: tama 2 dama 2 sama 2 masa 2 dhama 2 mahakārūṇika mahātamondhakāravidhamana ṣaḍpāramitā paripūraka //
S04bsu002_u:171: kara 2 kiri 2 kurū 2 para 2 hara 2 hiri 2 vara 2 sara 2 kara 2 kaṭa 2 kiṭi 2 kuṭu 2 maṭa 2 /
S04bsu002_u:172: mahāśuddhasattva viṣayanivāsina mahākārūṇika śvetayajñopavitaratna makuṭa mālādhara /
S04bsu002_u:173: sarvajñaśirasi kṛta jaṭāmakuṭa mahādbhuta kamalālaṅkṛta karataladhyānasamādhivimokṣaṃ aprakampya bahusattva santatiparivāraka /
S04bsu002_u:191: om raṇa raṇa om phaṭ svāhā /
S04bsu002_u:195: oṃ hrīḥ trailokyavijayāmoghapāśapratihata hrīṃ haḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
S04bsu002_u:199: oṃ ārolika hrīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā // //
S04bsu002_u:200: sarṣaparavadirakīlakādyaiḥ sarvajvareṣu sūtrakaṃ vandhayitavyaṃ sarvavyādhiṣu ghṛtatailamudakaṃ vā parijapya dātavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:201: kākhordacchedanaṃ rakṣā sūtreṇa śastreṇa udaraśūlena lavaṇodakaṃ viṣa nāśanaṃ mṛttikayā udakena vā cakṣurogena śvetasūtrakaṃ karṇe vandhayitavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:203: sīmāvandhe paṃcaraṅigakasūtrakamekaviṃśativārān parijapya catuḥṣu khadirakīleṣu vaddhvā caturddiśaṃ nikhātavyaṃ simā vandho bhavati /
S04bsu002_u:204: sarvarakṣā sūtrakena udakena bhasmakena vā sarvagraheṣu /
S04bsu002_u:205: paṃcaraṅigaka sūtrakaṃ sarvajvareṣu śvetasūtrakaṃ sarppakīṭhalūtalohaliṅgala graheṣu /
S04bsu002_u:207: gandhodakaṃ palāśodakaṃ madhūyaṣṭyudaka vā sarvakalikalaha vivādebhyaḥ ākhyāneṣu udakaṃ parijapya mukhaprakṣālayitavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:208: paraviṣayarājyarāṣṭrakeṣu pūrṇakalaśaṃ sthāpayitvā śūcināsūcivastraprāvṛtena mahatī pūjāṃ kṛtvā bācayitavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:210: tena codakena sektavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
S04bsu002_u:212: mudritāyā candanatilakaṃ hṛdaye ekaviṃśativārān parijapya kartavyaṃ sarvānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ yānti /
S04bsu002_u:219: gandhaḥ priyaṃgu tagaracakrā mahācakrāviṣṇukrāntā somarājī sūnandā ceti /
S04bsu002_u:221: aṣṭottaraśatavārān parijapya maṇiṃ kṛtvā śirasi bāhau vā dhārayitavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:222: bālānāṃ galenārīṇāṃ vilagne svayaṃ paraṃ saubhāgyakaraṃ /
S04bsu002_u:230: āryāvallokiteśvarahṛdayaṃ paramasiddhamasasādhita mete tāni karmmāṇi kurute /
S04bsu002_u:232_1: eṇeya carmakṛtaparikaraḥ paśupativeśadhara sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikena
S04bsu002_u:233: tataḥsādhakena tasyāgrataḥ gomayena maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā śvetapuṣpāvakīrṇa aṣṭāu gandhodakapūrṇakumbhāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu002_u:235: vali mānsaṃ ca rūdhirabarjjitaṃ agarūdhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāaṣṭamasahasraṃ jāpayitavyā /
S04bsu002_u:237: triśūklabhojina triṣkālasnāpayitā śūcivastraprāvṛtto bhūtvā japā dātavyaṃ /
S04bsu002_u:238: ataḥ pratimāyā 'rpataḥ ātmānaṃ ca likhitaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu002_u:239: taddaṣṭvā ca prahṛṣyati yāvat svapnane vā āryāvalokiteśvaro āgacchati /
S04bsu002_u:241: manaḥ śilāṃ rajataṃ vā parijapya kṣīṇāṃjayitvā tatoantarhito bhavati /
S04bsu002_u:245_0: idamavocat bhagavānāttamanā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva rūteca bhikṣavarūte
S04bsu002_u:245_1: ca bodhisatvāste śuddhāvāsakāyikāśca devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsura gandharvaścaloko
S04bsu002_u:248: hyavadatteṣāṃca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
